name: OrwellianComputer
0:
”Alexa, start Orwellian Computer.”
”Alexa, launch Orwellian Computer.”
”Alexa, talk to Orwellian Computer.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: orwellian computer
des:
This skill is inspired by my recent reading of George Orwell's 1984.

Using a top-secret algorithm, this skill tells you how closely you follow the paradigms of the Party, based on your name. Are you a devoted follower of the Party, or did you need some doublethink infusion, just like Winston? Download the skill and find out today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
